content.rendered:
Tired of spending your day in a usual manner? If yes, then why don’t you plan for a trip to Varanasi and enjoy the eccentric nightlife experience. This spiritual city of India is established gracefully on the banks of River Ganges and is immensely popular for Benarasi Silk Sarees. The remnants and the findings at Rajghat demonstrate that it is one of the most ancient inhabited cities in the world.

This magical city holds huge significance in Hinduism, Buddhism, and Jainism and the origin of Ayurveda medication. Nightlife in Varanasi is so sophisticated and splendid offering unique and irresistible experience to the travelers. Those who wonder what else they can do in the city for besides witnessing religious experiences then this article will help them in knowing more about nightlife in Varanasi.

Go for a boat ride in River Ganges

Nourished by River Ganga, Varanasi is believed to be one of the spiritual and cities of the country due to its association with Lord Shiva. River Ganga takes the spiritual aura of this notch higher due to its association with Lord Vishnu, Lord Shiva, and Lord Brahma, the trinity of Hindus. It is really a mesmeric site wherein travelers and the locals gather every night around the Ghat and offering prayers to the holy river.

Enjoying boat ride and witnessing the captivation glory of surroundings and the gorgeous river adorned with colorful diyas and flowers, is something that one must not miss in Varanasi.

Exploring the most happening nightclubs in Varanasi

Nightlife in Varanasi is quite elegant and magnificent that attracts several travelers and local folks from different places to hover around in the city. There are numerous nightclubs and pubs in the city and a few of them are enlisted in this post. Do you count yourself a party animal? If yes, then get ready to spend some wonderful moments at these night places.

Trishna Pubs

One of the most happening and topmost night clubs of this spiritual city and the interior of this is super amazing and is painted gracefully with light colors. Some good seating and proper furnishing of table matching with the bright color painted walls makes this place more gorgeous. The food served tastes so enticing and treats your taste buds with lip-smacking food and special brands of drinks served including vodka shots, beers, etc.

Activity Cost: INR 2000 for 2 guests

Entry timings: between 11 am and 11 pm

Prinsep Bar

This small-sized yet very popular bar established in order to pay respect to James Princep, a great famous artist. He is one of those great artists who have made some great sketches of the ghats and the temples in Varanasi. This high class bear bar with the mixed magic of old times and serves you with finger-licking, scotch, and other delectable cuisines to elevate your taste.

The simple yet classy interior designing of this bar attracts tourists and the locals in a huge number. If you are on a honeymoon or looking for wine tasting then you shall definitely explore this place.

Activity Cost: INR 2000 for 2 persons

Entry timings: between 12 pm and 11 pm

Windsor Bar

One of the most wonderful places to witness an exciting nightlife in Varanasi, Windsor Bar offers its guests with refreshing drinks to enjoy with your friends and other travel companions. This cozy bar serves you with refreshing drinks like wines, vodka shots, etc. at reasonable rates. The interior of the bar seems too soothing as the walls are painted with vibrant colors and filled with wonderful furniture.

This relaxing and cozy place serves you with delectable cuisines and that too at very reasonable rates. The staffs working here are quite humble and well mannered and this attracts youth to enjoy some special moment.

Activity Cost: INR 1200 for 2 people

Entry timings: the bar is opened throughout the day

Mangi Ferra Pub

Those who are on a Varanasi trip with their friends and looking for a night party and that also under your budget then you must consider Mangi Ferra Pub. This happens to be one of the most wonderful pubs to enjoy some refreshing drinks and lip-smacking snacks at very affordable rates. Likewise, other pubs and nightclubs Mangi Ferra Pub is also painted with cool colors and is filled with furniture of vibrant color.

Also, the seating arrangement of the pub is very nice and comfortable so that the customers can enjoy their fun gossips with your friends and closed ones. You can also enjoy the mouth-watering eateries along with some refreshing drinks.

Activity Cost: INR 600 for 2 people

Entry Timing: between 11 am and 11 pm

Shop out your heart’s content

Experiencing Nightlife in Varanasi and quenching your shopping desire is a fantastic thing that one must not miss out in the tiny hours of sunset. Get yourself indulged in shopping out ornate jewels, beautiful silk sarees, and several other things to buy as a souvenir. Thatheri Bazaar and Vishwanath Gali are the two most renowned shopping hubs in Varanasi. Generally, the market areas in the city gets open by 9:30 am and close at 10 pm.

In this post, we have enlisted some of the best night clubs of Varanasi and other places that you can explore to spend some really amazing moments with your family and friends. Varanasi is a city that welcomes huge influx of tourists every year and if you haven’t booked your tickets yet then hurry up and book your Varanasi tour packages with us.

Frequently Asked Questions

Let’s discuss some very common questions that everyone wants to enjoy their nightlife in Varanasi, the spiritual city of India.

Q. Do bars and pubs serve in Varanasi serve vegetarian food?

Ans- If you are a vegetarian and looking to binge on vegetarian foods but confused whether you will get your favorite dishes or not then throw all your worries away as the bars and clubs of the city offers vegetarian dishes.

Q. Is there any specific dress code one has to follow in the bars?

Ans- Not compulsory at every nightclub and bars but yes there are certain places where you will have to follow the dress codes. You can check out the official website of the particular place you are planning to visit.

Q. What are the nightclubs in the city ideal for?

Ans- the bars and the nightclubs in Varanasi are ideal for a group of friends, solo, and the couple who have come here to give a beautiful start to their newly married life.

Q. Do we need to make any prior reservations at the nightclubs and bars in the city?

Ans- Many of the bars and pubs are opened for a particular period of time due to the strict guidelines of the particular area where they are located. Hence, you need to do prior bookings for your entry to such places.

Q. What is the approximate activity cost in the bars?

Ans- The cost varies accordingly however, it ranges between 600 and 2500 depending upon the facilities, services and many other parameters.

  • Varanasi Allahabad Tour
  • Varanasi Allahabad Ayodhya Tour
  • Varanasi Sightseeing Tour
  • Allahabad Varanasi Puri Tour
  • Varanasi Bodhgaya Chitrakoot Tour
  • Varanasi Temple Tour
  • Uttar Pradesh Tour Packages
